column4: where exactly can i get the ms core fonts package for ubuntu ?
yeah, you need to enable the multiverse repository, look at what ubotu just PMed you
i wish the errors were a bit less preposterous
I don't see how that error message can say anything different and still actually make sense.
i did enable the multiverse repository
and ran sudo apt-get update? (or clicked reload in synaptic)
That's breezy-security, you need to edit the line that says for just breezy
You have the base installed though.
of course it doesn't actually work ...
Exactly what it sounds like, the essential stuff for building things.
why would i want the compiler by itself ?
err, build-essential installs more than the compiler
If you want the low-level details build-essential contains all of the packages you can assume are already installed on a buildd (server to build packages for the distro)
